Return to the Original Diet 

     God is trying to lead us back, step by step, to His original design--that man should subsist upon the natural products of the earth. Among those who are waiting for the coming of the Lord meat eating will eventually be done away; flesh will cease to form a part 
                                                                           82
of their diet. We should ever keep this end in view and endeavor to work steadily toward it.--CH 450 (1890).
